description: Auto set employee for Custom Timesheet when user has Employee role
name: Auto Set Employee for Custom Timesheet

description: Calculate taken hours from start and end datetime
name: Calculate Taken Hours
script:
# Calculate taken hours from start and end datetime
if doc.start_date_time and doc.end_date_time:
    from datetime import datetime
    
    # Parse the datetime strings
    start_dt = datetime.strptime(str(doc.start_date_time), '%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S')
    end_dt = datetime.strptime(str(doc.end_date_time), '%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S')
    
    # Calculate difference in hours
    time_diff = end_dt - start_dt
    hours = time_diff.total_seconds() / 3600
    
    # Set the calculated hours
    doc.taken_hours = round(hours, 2)
    
    # Validate that end time is after start time
    if hours < 0:
        frappe.throw("End Date and Time must be after Start Date and Time")
    
    # Validate maximum hours per day (24 hours)
    if hours > 24:
        frappe.throw("Working hours cannot exceed 24 hours per day")
